ComicInfo.Title: Eat Fit to Stay Right; Harry Kirschner; Once More, With or Without Feeling; Big Blowout in the Donut Shop; Any Place I Can Crash?; My Life in Art Is Falling Apart; It Pays to Advertise; The Hopeless Paranoid Works Himself into a Frenzy; A Flaw in the Ointment; Ain' It the Truth; A Good Shit Is Best; Automatic Transmission; Back to Basics; The Little Dope Fiends in Concert
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 08:52:15. [CVDB367324] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 20:48:40. [Issue ID 277760]
ComicInfo.Summary:
A man sitting in a diner tells his friend why he thinks Woody Allen is a phony.
Rollins give some advice on life to a man he hasn't seen in a while.
Four men standing on the sidewalk state what their favorite sexual activities are.
